dp:metadata.dc:title: JR 10 - The Hard Way (2006)
dp:metadata.dc:creator: Lee Child
dp:metadata.dc:description: In Lee Child's astonishing new thriller, ex-military cop Reacher sees more than most people would...and because of that, he's thrust into an explosive situation that's about to blow up in his face. For the only way to find the truth--and save two innocent lives--is to do it the way Jack Reacher does it best: the hard way....
